text_block_list.text: Today is a [Selection Race]. A full-scale event for Uma Musume that will heavily influence their future prospects.
Gathered on the course were several up-and-coming Uma Musume, all were the same in that they were fired up, aiming for their debut… However-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Wooow, there are alot of people here! It's almost like we're having a party~!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Since we have so many people here, after the race how about we all have a barbeque?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Hey! How about you?

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Eh?! M-me…? I'll have to decline…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Oh, is that so? Too bad, so sad, maybe next time then.
-There was an Uma Musume who stood out, in a different way.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Taiki Shuttle, is it?… She's got talent but, that way she can't seem to stand still is concerning.

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: It seems that in mock races, she's had a lot of failed starts. How will she do today…?
And so the race began, the center of attention, Taiki Shuttle was-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yahoooooooo!!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Here comes Taiki Shuttle!! She's so fast, what fearsome speed!!
That dash strength she showed out of the gate was definitely eye-catching. But-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Haa haa haa… Oh?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: What's this?! Taiki Shuttle is starting to slow down!! She keeps getting passed by the others~!!

text_block_list.name: Average Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Eeh?! Wait, where's she looking now?!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: Hmmm, it definitely seems like her concentration is a problem…
In the end, Taiki Shuttle only got moderate results after the race.
After the mock race was over, while I was walking down the road…

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Uuu… my head is spinning…
choice_data_list: (Wasn't she in the race with Taiki…?)

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Kyaa…!
It looked like she was in bad shape, she stumbled and looked like she was about to collapse. In a panic, I was about to run up to her when-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: -Daaaaaaaash!!
In that instant, someone came dashing past me…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: -And Caaaaaaatch!!

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Eh…?
Like a gust of win, with startling speed Taiki Shuttle ran up beside her, and splendidly caught her in her arms…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Good! Looks like I made it in time!

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Ehh, eh, eh? Taiki Shuttle-san…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: You didn't look too good during the race either. Pushing yourself too hard is a no no! Don't do it!

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Y-you noticed…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yes, of course!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Alright, let's get you to the infirmary! Make sure you hold on tight!

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Huh…?

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Okay!…it's an emergency! Coming throuuuuuuuugh!

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Hyaaaaaaaaa-?!
Once again, she took off with amazing speed! With speed like that it's hard to believe she's carrying another Uma Musume…!
I was really curious, so without thinking I followed after them-

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: It's good that it wasn't anything to worry about! Make sure to take care~!

text_block_list.name: Timid-looking Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Thank you Taiki-san, see you later…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: See you~!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, getting to see her happy smile was a good thing! As I thought, it's best when everyone is happy!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: -Oh?! You, since when have you…?
choice_data_list: I was just curious about you
I was just curious about you

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: About me…? Oh, that badge on your collar…!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Are you perhaps… scouting!? Scouting me?!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Yahoooooooo!! Okay okay, of course it's okay!! I'm so happy~~~~~!!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: I need to go write my family a letter! My friends too!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: That's right, we should throw a party too!! Of course, Trainer-san should come too!!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: The barbeque I make is a masterpiece, you know~!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: We can work out the details tomorrow! Besides, from now on we're always going to be together during training!

text_block_list.name: Taiki Shuttle
text_block_list.text: Well then Trainer-san, see you tomorrow!! I look forward to working with you!!
And like that, Taiki Shuttle took off like a storm…
